scenes.text:
Emergency strobes slash through smoke, turning each corridor into red freeze-frames.
A scream cuts off above you, followed by the wet scrape of something heavy being dragged.
Your crew tastes bleach, blood, and burned wiring in the air.
From inside the wall, a voice whispers your names like roll call for the dead.

choices.label: Rip open the supply locker for a weapon
choices.text: Rip open the supply locker for a weapon
choices.fullText: Pry the steel locker apart and arm up before the horde closes in.
choices.stakes: Immediate power, but the noise can pull infected straight to you.

choices.label: Sprint for the chained fire door
choices.text: Sprint for the chained fire door
choices.fullText: Bet on speed and reach the only marked exit before this floor collapses.
choices.stakes: Fast escape chance, but you might run into a sealed kill zone.

scenes.text:
The locker tears open with a shriek of metal and your hand finds a blood-slick crowbar.
Something slams into the opposite wall, then another body, then three more.
Hungry feet drum down the hall in uneven rhythm, too many to count.
Your flashlight catches teeth first, then faces.

choices.label: Charge the hallway before they surround you
choices.text: Charge the hallway before they surround you
choices.fullText: Hit first and carve a path before the corridor becomes a cage.
choices.stakes: Momentum if you break through, fatal if you stall.

choices.label: Kill the lights and slip through the kitchen
choices.text: Kill the lights and slip through the kitchen
choices.fullText: Disappear into darkness and thread a stealth route through service halls.
choices.stakes: Lower noise, but one wrong step leaves you blind and trapped.

scenes.text:
You hit the fire door at full speed and the chain pin rattles loose in your hands.
Bodies hammer the opposite side hard enough to bend the frame inward.
Cold fingers force through the widening gap, clawing for your throat.
The emergency alarm loops: EVACUATION ROUTE COMPROMISED.

choices.label: Force the door open and blast through
choices.text: Force the door open and blast through
choices.fullText: Explode through the breach and gamble on raw force to clear a path.
choices.stakes: Could break containment in your favor, or drop you into a swarm.

choices.label: Drop into the service vents
choices.fullText: Abandon the main route and crawl maintenance shafts under the chaos.
choices.stakes: Stealth route with limited exits if infected flood the duct line.

scenes.text:
Flies cloud the prep tables and rotten meat swings from broken hooks.
A cracked radio repeats rooftop extraction coordinates between bursts of static.
Above you, vents rattle as something crawls directly over your position.
Each breath echoes louder than it should.

choices.label: Follow the radio to the rooftop signal point
choices.text: Follow the radio to the rooftop signal point
choices.fullText: Chase the last clear transmission and race for aerial extraction.
choices.stakes: Best rescue odds, but the rooftop is fully exposed.

choices.label: Barricade the freezer and wait for first light
choices.text: Barricade the freezer and wait for first light
choices.fullText: Lock down cold storage and ride out the night in silence.
choices.stakes: Temporary safety, but surrendering movement can cost initiative.

scenes.text:
The stairwell is a vertical meat grinder of bodies climbing over bodies.
Hands reach through railings and snag your sleeves as you pass each landing.
Outside, the fire escape sways in storm wind, glass between you and open air.
Behind you, the infected roar like a single throat.

choices.label: Fight upward through the swarm
choices.fullText: Keep climbing through direct contact and trust brute will over panic.
choices.stakes: High casualty risk, but wins control if your line holds.

choices.label: Leap through the glass to the fire escape
choices.text: Leap through the glass to the fire escape
choices.fullText: Break out now and take the exposed external route around the pack.
choices.stakes: Fast reposition, severe injury risk before the next decision.

scenes.text:
Rotor thunder rolls across the skyline, but the helicopter is still out of sight.
Your final flare sputters while the street below fills with moving bodies wall to wall.
The dead begin spilling onto your building from three adjacent roofs.
Wind tears words out of your mouth before your crew can answer.

choices.label: Ignite your last flare and hold your ground
choices.text: Ignite your last flare and hold your ground
choices.fullText: Signal hard and commit to a defensive stand until extraction sees you.
choices.stakes: Max visibility for rescue, max visibility for every infected nearby.

choices.label: Jump across to the next roof in the dark
choices.text: Jump across to the next roof in the dark
choices.fullText: Abandon the signal and trust a blind leap to break pursuit.
choices.stakes: Instant escape chance, catastrophic failure if distance is wrong.

scenes.text:
Floodlights ignite and lock on your crew from armored barricades ahead.
Military loudspeakers order you to kneel for immediate containment processing.
Behind you, the infected close in; ahead, rifles rise in perfect formation.
One second from now, someone else chooses what happens to you.

choices.label: Run the decon lane under floodlights
choices.text: Run the decon lane under floodlights
choices.fullText: Submit to quarantine and gamble that protocol beats panic.
choices.stakes: Higher survival odds, lower freedom and total control loss.

choices.label: Hijack the armored truck and punch through
choices.text: Hijack the armored truck and punch through
choices.fullText: Take the vehicle and force an escape before either side owns you.
choices.stakes: Freedom if successful, full crossfire if it fails.

scenes.text:
You slam the truck through steel barricades and break onto open highway.
Tracer fire fades behind you as quarantine and horde collide in your wake.
Your crew is alive, bloodied, and uncontained.

You endure freezing decon mist under floodlights that never blink.
Hours later, your crew staggers into a guarded safe zone with numbered wristbands.
The city is gone, but your names are still on the living roster.

Your foot slips on wet concrete at the edge of the jump.
The scream is brief, swallowed by a wall of hands and teeth below.
By dawn, even the rooftop flare is dark.
